content.description:
Start sitting, do the mantel-thing, which is the only actual climbing required, and finish straight up.

On the trailside mini-boulder boulder. Worth doing as part of the Forestland easy circuit.
content.location: On the left side of the trail-facing side of the mini-boulder.

content.description: The better line on the mini-boulder. This is the boulder's longest line, and has wee holds that transition to satisfying, good holds at the end. Not bad.
content.protection: Good rock, decent landing. Maybe a pad.
content.location: Just right of the tree on the non-trail facing side of the mini-boulder. Look for the mini-boulder as you are headed away from Cruise Control, and uphill towards Upper Forestland.

content.description:
Done all the problems in the well traveled Forestlands? Interested in diamond in the rough butt draggers? Already done and sprayed about breadline right, the real thing left, busted eliminate 420 that goes at v6.9, arrested development left/middle/right?

Enter Hearthstone Yabo. Probably been done before, but let me know if it has/hasn't.

Sit start to hearthstone. Start on good undercling shelf with right hand, good incut crimp with left hand, and ass on the ground. Pull hard to move up the arete.
content.location: Just to the right of scarecrow

content.description:
Start standing with good holds at head-height, and climb straight up.

All of these little climbs get shade most of the day, so although you may not be thrilled by them, at least you won't be baking.

On the right side of the trailside mini-boulder boulder. Worth doing as part of the Forestland easy circuit.
content.location: Right side of the trailside mini-boulder.

content.description:
This is a little slab left of the tree next to the mini-boulder on your right, as you head up to Upper Forestland. A couple of moves, and a satisfying jug near the top.

Worth doing if you're running around doing all these easy stuff in the area.
content.protection: Good rock, decent landing. Maybe a pad.
content.location: Faces downhill on the mini-boulder on the right on your way up to Upper Forestland. This climb faces Cruise Control.

content.description:
A little scoopy, slabby thing on the uphill side of the mini-boulder. Start standing, and work up and around the corner to finish.

Another pretty good climb in the Forestland Easies circuit.
content.location:
Uphill side of the mini-boulder. Encounter the mini-boulder as you are headed away from Cruise Control and towards Upper Forestland. Non-trail side of the boulder.

Right of Scarecrow.
